html.description: The HTML page that should be loaded for a custom widget

url.description: The URL which should be loaded

x.description: Horizontal position of the upper left corner of the widget

y.description: Vertical position of the upper left corner of the widget

touchEnabled.description: Indicates whether touch controls are simulated, especially great in combination with a mobile user agent

additionalProperties.description: A custom user agent for a specific domain

customUserAgent.description: Mapping of domains to custom user agents

additionalProperties.description: Indicates whether a specific permission is granted

permissions.description: Mapping of permission types (strings) to booleans

customScript.description: A custom JS script you want to be loaded on the widget webpage

devTools.description: Enable developer tools for this widget
